bulk-upload-uan.maxFileSize: The selected file must be smaller than 25MB.
bulk-upload-uan.fileType: The selected file must be a CSV.
bulk-upload-uan.invalidColumns: Please ensure you have at least the following columns in your CSV file: UAN, DOB
bulk-upload-uan.missingValues: There are missing values in this file. Please check it to ensure no mandatory field values are missing.
bulk-upload-uan.hasDuplicates: There are duplicate applications in this CSV file. Please remove any duplicates.
bulk-upload-uan.hasBadUan: UANs must be in the format 1234-5678-1234-5678. Please check all included UANs match this pattern.
bulk-upload-uan.processingError: There was an error processing this CSV. Please try again.

confirm-data-checked.required: Confirm that your file contains complete and correct records.
